resources.string: Table of Contents
This is the main screen of the app, where users can see their feed, notifications, and other activities.
This screen shows the user\'s profile information, such as their name, bio, and photos.
This screen shows the user\'s messages, both sent and received.
This screen allows the user to change their account settings, such as their privacy settings and notifications.
This button is used to watch or broadcast live videos.
This button is used to create and watch short, looping videos.
This button is used to categorize posts and find other users who are interested in the same topics.
This button is used to create and vote on polls.
This button is used to share temporary posts that disappear after 24 hours.
This button is used to send private messages to other users.
This button is used to create and join groups of users with shared interests.
This button is used to create and attend events.
This button is used to see news and updates from the people and organizations you follow.
This button is used to like a post.
This button is used to share a post with others.
This button is used to follow a user.
This button is used to unfollow a user.
This button is used to block a user.
This button is used to report a post or user.
This button is used to search for posts, users, and groups.
This button is used to upload a post.
This button is used to edit a post.
This button is used to delete a post.
This button is used to manage your account settings.
This button is used to manage your privacy settings.
This button is used to manage your notification settings.
This button is used to get help with the app.
This button is used to contact the app developers.
